original_title: Mother on stage to receive dead son’s degree certificate
original_body_lines: It was an emotional moment for all those attending the convocation of Jaffna University on Thursday (20) when the mother appeared on the stage to receive the degree certificate of her son who had died in an accident

A final year student of the Vavuniya faculty of the Jaffna University Disanayaka Mudiyanselage Hasan Sagara Dissanayake had appeared for the degree examination in Applied Maths and Computer Science before he died in a motorcycle accident in Medawachchiya area.

She broke into tears and stepped onto the stage to receive her son’s degree certificate when Vice Chancellor Prof. Sri Sathgunarajah invited her to come and receive it. Chancellor C. Pathmanathan presided over the convocation. The fellow students of Hasan Sagara helped her back to the audience after receiving the certificate. (ROMESH MADUSANKA)
